description: Â How do you set the valuation of a company that is like your baby? This course titled, "How Do I Set My Startups Valuation?" covers everything from valuing a seed round, how much capital you need to any current revenues. In the course, our INVESTyR DealTeam uses screencasts, interviews and video presentations to explain these concepts which will help you master this topic in under 6 weeks. Take this course and learn that no one really knows what your business is worth, it's only worth what someone will pay for it. Sign up today and learn how to pick realistic numbers that help value your business for its appropriate market value.
title: How To Set Up My Startups Evaluation
